resources.string: Error! Airport code must be 3 letters.
Error! Airport code must only contain letters.
Are you sure you want to search flights for this airport?
Error while fetching flight data. Please try again.

Welcome to our Flight Tracker app! This application is designed to provide information on flights departing from a specific airport.\n\nTo get started, simply enter a valid airport code (comprised of 3 letters) into the text field and press the \'Search\' button. You will be presented with a list of flights departing from the chosen airport. We hope you find this tool useful and informative!
